name: Survival Shooter (Mateo Ceballos)
description:
Move with WASD. Aim and shoot with the mouse.

Try to survive the most you can.

This game was made following a tutorial series from Academia de Videojuegos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLREdURb87ks1ctnyBrxijjFECqnXAmz42&disable_polymer=true

I just added more features.
